üìà Leaderboard (Live Ranking)
üèÖ Rank üë§ User üî¢ Points
{{ user.rank }} {{ user.name }} {{ user.totalPoints }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { User } from '../../models/user'; import { UserService } from '../../services/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-leaderboard', templateUrl: './leaderboard.component.html', }) export class LeaderboardComponent implements OnInit { leaderboard: User[] = []; topThree: User[] = []; constructor(private userService: UserService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.fetchLeaderboard(); setInterval(() => this.fetchLeaderboard(), 5000); } fetchLeaderboard(): void { this.userService.getLeaderboard().subscribe((data) => { this.leaderboard = data; this.topThree = data.slice(0, 3); // extract top 3 }); } }
